messages.subject: New at SandraDodd.com
messages.msgSnippet: You can subscribe to announcements of new pages or additions to my site here: http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com Below is this week s news: Additions
messages.messageBody:
You can subscribe to announcements of new pages or additions to my site here:
http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com

Below is this week's news:


Additions (bottom) to the reality page:
SandraDodd.com/reality

New example at the bottom of "abundance":
SandraDodd.com/abundance

Portuguese translation of one of Pam Sorooshian's pages and two interviews with me:
Princ�pios do "Unschooling"
Porque fiz �unschooling� com os meus tr�s filhos
Uma Entrevista com Sandra Dodd, 1998

If you know anyone who reads Portuguese, forward this on!
Marta Pires (in Portugal) did the translations, and Alex Polikowsky (from Brazil) did a pass to help polish them up.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
